Title: Get All Products
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /products
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate response structure
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain 'products' array
3. Response should contain 'total' and 'limit' fields
4. Products array should not be empty

Title: Get Single Product by Valid ID
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /products/1
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate product data
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain product with id=1
3. Response should have 'title', 'price', 'category' fields

Title: Search Products by Keyword
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /products/search?q=phone
2. Verify response status code
3. Check search results
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain 'products' array
3. Product titles should contain search keyword

Title: Get Products with Pagination
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with limit=10 and skip=5
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate pagination parameters
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should have limit=10
3. Response should have skip=5
4. Products array length should be â‰¤10

Title: Get Product Categories
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /products/categories
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate categories list
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should be an array
3. Array should contain category names

Title: Filter Products by Category
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /products/category/smartphones
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate filtered products
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain 'products' array
3. All products should have category='smartphones'

Title: Add New Product
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request to /products/add with product data
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate created product
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 201
2. Response should contain the product with generated id
3. Product title should match input
4. Product price should match input

Title: Update Existing Product
Test Steps:
1. Send PUT request to /products/1 with update data
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate updated product
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Product title should be updated
3. Product id should remain 1

Title: Delete Product
Test Steps:
1. Send DELETE request to /products/1
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate deletion response
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain 'isDeleted':true
3. Response should contain deleted product id

Title: Get Product with Invalid ID
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /products/9999
2. Verify response status code
3. Check error message
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 404
2. Response should contain error message

Title: Get All Users
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /users
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate response structure
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain 'users' array
3. Users array should not be empty
4. Each user should have 'id', 'username', 'email' fields

Title: Get Single User by Valid ID
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /users/1
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate user data
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain user with id=1
3. User should have 'username', 'email', 'firstName', 'lastName' fields

Title: Search Users by Keyword
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /users/search?q=john
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate search results
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain 'users' array
3. Search results should be relevant to query

Title: Filter Users by Attribute
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with filter parameters
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate filtered users
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain 'users' array
3. Filtered results should match criteria

Title: Get User with Invalid ID
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /users/9999
2. Verify response status code
3. Check error response
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 404
2. Response should contain error message

Title: User Login with Valid Credentials
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request to /auth/login with valid credentials
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate authentication tokens
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain 'accessToken'
3. Response should contain 'refreshToken'
4. Response should contain user details (id, username)

Title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request to /auth/login with invalid credentials
2. Verify response status code
3. Check error message
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 400
2. Response should contain error message
3. No tokens should be returned

Title: Get Current Authenticated User
Preconditions: User is logged in with valid token
Test Steps:
1. Login to get access token
2. Send GET request to /auth/me with token in header
3. Verify response status code
4. Validate user data
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain authenticated user details
3. Username should match logged-in user

Title: Refresh Authentication Token
Test Steps:
1. Login to get refresh token
2. Send POST request to /auth/refresh with refresh token
3. Verify response status code
4. Validate new tokens
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain new 'accessToken'
3. Response should contain new 'refreshToken'

Title: Get All Carts
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /carts
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate response structure
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain 'carts' array
3. Each cart should have 'id', 'products', 'total', 'userId'

Title: Get Single Cart by ID
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /carts/1
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate cart data
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain cart with id=1
3. Cart should have 'products' array
4. Cart should have 'total' and 'userId' fields

Title: Get User Specific Carts
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /carts/user/1
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate user carts
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should contain 'carts' array
3. All carts should belong to userId=1

Title: Add New Cart
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request to /carts/add with cart data
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate created cart
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 201
2. Response should contain cart with generated id
3. Cart should have correct userId and products

2. Response should contain 'quotes' array

Test Steps:

Title: Products Endpoint Response Time
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /products
2. Measure response time
3. Verify response time threshold
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response time should be less than 2 seconds

Title: Users Endpoint Response Time
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /users
2. Measure response time
3. Verify response time threshold
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response time should be less than 2 seconds

Title: Empty Search Query
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with empty search query
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate response
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 200
2. Response should handle empty query gracefully
3. Response should contain 'products' array

Title: Invalid Endpoint
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to non-existent endpoint
2. Verify response status code
3. Check error message
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 404
2. Response should indicate endpoint not found

Title: Malformed JSON in POST Request
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with malformed JSON
2. Verify response status code
3. Check error handling
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 400 or 422
2. Response should contain error message about invalid JSON

Title: Missing Required Fields in POST
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with empty body
2. Verify response status code
3. Validate error response
Expected Result:
1. Status code should be 400 or 422
2. Response should indicate missing required fields
